resources.string: Do you Charge 5% GST as shop services on all clothes?
Click on it to upload License Image

TERMS AND CONDITIONS 
 Welcome to www.Launderup.com (“Website”, “Site”, “Application”, Company), to use the Services of Company or by any of its affiliates, the entity (“You”, “Your”, “User”, “Customer”) must agree to the following conditions. If you visit through this Website, you accept these conditions. 
 Your access to, and browsing, review and use of this Website is subject to these Terms and Conditions and all applicable laws. By accessing and using the Site, you accept the Terms and Conditions, without limitation or qualification. If you do not agree to the Terms and Conditions, do not use this Site. If, at any time, any of the Terms and Conditions is no longer acceptable by you, immediately terminate your use of the Site. 
 LAUNDERUP (“Company”) is providing cheapest laundry services whilst connecting the shop-keepers, individual, entity, organizations and customers to avail the services of laundry. The ultimate aim of our Company is to create database, provide cheapest laundry services and connect Customer to the laundry service providers in their proximate locality. 
 You hereby agree to the general Terms and Conditions sets forth herein, to avail the laundry services by connecting through the Company (“Services”). The Services offered by the Company through their official Mobile Application - www.Launderup.com. 
 1. PRIVACY Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your visit to our Application, to fully understand our practices. 
 2. ELIGIBILITY The Services of the website are available only to persons who are competent to enter into a legally binding contract under the law of republic of India or other applicable jurisdiction, including un-discharged solvents, minors etc are not eligible for the Services provided by the Company and hence shall not register as a User or transact to this Website. In the event of Corporate entity, you represent and warrant that you have the legal authority to bind such corporate entity to the terms and conditions, in which case the terms “You”, “Your”, “User” or “Customer” shall refer to such corporate entity. 
 3. ELECTRONIC COMMUNICATIONS 
 A. LEGAL SATISFACTION When you visit www.Launderup.com or send emails to us, you are communicating with us electronically. B. CONSENT By communicating with us, you consent to receive communications from us electronically. We will communicate with you by e-mail, WhatsApp or by newsletters. 
 4. SITE ACCESS This Site grants you a limited access to the laundry services and the Customer can buy such Services and adept the information, database, offers, coupons, etc. 
 5. WARRANTY The Company and its affiliates attempt to be as accurate as possible for the Services. The database as well as other information of the laundry service providers are authentic to be able to provide laundry Services to the Customer. However, the Company makes no warranties that the content/information on the Application are error-free. We take the responsibility to evaluate the best possible content and Services of high standard for the Customers. 
 6. COPYRIGHT 
 A. Copyright Protection All content included on this Application, such as text, graphics, logos., button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilation, and software is the property of this Website or its affiliates and protected by the Copyright laws and international copyright laws. The compilation of all content, information, news and others on this Site is the exclusive property of the Company and protected by the copyright laws. All software used on this Site is the property of the Company or its software suppliers and protected by the copyright laws. 
 B. FALSE INFORMATION You may not use a false e-mail address, impersonate any person or entity, or otherwise mislead as to the origin or other misinformation. The Company reserves the right (but not the obligation) to remove/suspend or terminate any Customer, if found, any fraud committed by the Customer. 
 7. OBLIGATIONS AND TERMS: As a condition to using any of Company's services, and for the mutual benefit of both Company and the Customer, the undersigned ("Customer") agrees to the following terms and conditions:  All garments, clothes, linen, fabrics shall be the responsibility of the laundry service provider (“laundry shop-keepers”).  The Company only connects the Customer and the laundry shop-keepers at a reasonable rate and also be responsible for providing elite class service for laundry by launching monthly package subscriptions. The 18% GST (Gross-Service Tax) shall be applicable.  The Company shall ensure that washing, drying and folding services are maintained at a high level of quality by the laundry shop-keepers. 
 8. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY IN NO EVENT SHALL LAUNDERUP, ITS AFFILIATE, AND ALL THIRD-PARTY SERVICE PROVIDERS, BE LIABLE TO THE CUSTOMER OR ANY OTHER PERSON OR ENTITY FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING ANY THAT MAY RESULT FROM:  The articles (garments, clothes, linen, fabrics of any kind) which belongs to the Customer and to which the local laundry service provider will be directly liable, the Company shall not, in any circumstances, be liable towards the Customer and the local laundry service provider;  Company does not hold any liability on account of damages occurred of any kind from the content published on our Website. 
 9. RELATIONSHIP This Terms of Use/Terms and Conditions shall not be construed to create any partnership, joint venture, employer employee, agency, or franchisor-franchisee relationship between the Company and Customer. 
 10. NOTICES All notices / communications shall be given to us by email to Launderup@launderup.com. Such notice will be deemed received in full on a business day and on the next business day if the email is sent on a weekend or public holiday. 
 11. LAW AND JURISDICTION These terms and conditions and the relationship between the Customer, service provider and the Company shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the Law of India and the Customer and service provider agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Courts of New Delhi. 
 12. SITE POLICIES, MODIFICATION, AND SEVERABILITY Please review our other policies, such as our Privacy Policy, posted on our Application. These policies also govern your visit to this Application. We reserve the right to make changes to our Site, policies, and these Conditions of Use at any time. If any of these conditions shall be deemed invalid, void, or for any reason unenforceable, that condition shall be deemed severable and shall not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining condition. 

 [Company Name – LaunderUp] [Email - Launderup@launderup.com]
I Agree to terms and condition
